title: How to get free Grammarly premium account
content: Our institute offers a premium access to Grammarly service. It can be activated using the institute E-mail id.
Step 1: Go to [1] . Remember to bypass proxy for library.iitkgp.ernet.in.
Step 2: Register for Grammarly Service. A mail will be received on the Institute email id given in the form.
Step 3: Go to Main Building -> Central Library-> Annex-building First floor -> Digital Library -> Assistant Librarian. Librarian will activate the account.
Note: Grammarly accounts are shared among multiple users (two users will share an account for one year), thus it is recommended not to change account details or password.
For any help mail to: [email protected] or [email protected]
